title: Understand the Product Rule of Exponents
text: The Product Rule states that when multiplying powers with the same base, you can add the exponents.

title: Apply the Product Rule
text: For the expression $$x^2$$ * $$x^5$$ * $$x^3$$, identify the base and sum the exponents to combine them.

title: Calculate the Sum of Exponents
text: What is the sum of the exponents $$2$$, $$5$$, and 3? You need to add them together to find the total power.

title: Express the Product as a Single Exponent
text: Now that you have the total for the exponents, write the original problem with a single base: $$x$$ to the power of that sum.
